content:
From the R3/R4 Conversion Map (https://hl7.org/fhir/deviceusestatement-version-maps.html), DeviceUseStatement.whenUsed is moved to an extension. However, I wasn't able to open the extension url or find the whenUsed extension under the Extension tab. Where do we suppose to return the whenUsed value in R4?
image.png

It's an auto-inferred extension. Any element that existed in STU3 that doesn't exist in R4 can be carried forward via a generic expression syntax as defined here: https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/versions.html#extensions
Oh didn't know that. That makes sense. Thank you!
Hanhong Lu has marked this topic as resolved.
